comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Sorry Steve, but I just couldn't sit down to the same plate for the 726th time... I needed a little break so I went a wanderin'. I found a cool side loop in Sunshine: the Timber Trail/Seven Knolls route. All dirt, mostly steep. And since it drops you right back in the Canyon, it makes a nice add-on. Reminds me a bit of NW Passage. We should add it to the docket, eh? DU
